column4: .... 3D acceleration on my ATI Radeon 8500LE card just stopped working after I had configured X to use two monitors. The monitor things works great, but now my 3D doesn't work.. =/ anyone know what to do?
hardware 3D acceleration brokes with my ati card if I have two monitors with xinerama in xorg.conf. If I only have one monitor, 3D works fine. How can i fix it?
with the method of getting 2 screens you are using, the second screen probably doesnt have Direct Rendering meaning no 3d
yeah... does 3D break on the whole system then?
some 3d things may try to work on both monitors though and stop if they cant get on to the second monitor

well, it's broken everywhere. If i run glxgears it doesn't turn smoothly,and yes, if i take that window to the extra screen, it's black. but still, hardware 3D are broken after installing another screen
work still being done in that area.. im lucky i only have one screen hehee
if you have nvidia, you should be able to get it working perfect
i don't. i just have ati. :) gona try mergedfb and see if that works.
ok the thing is that your ati card will have a maximum texture size of 2048x2048
so it wont work if your resolutions are above 1024
if you can cope with 2x 1024x768, you can have dual monitor 3d working fine
bleh, i don't want that =/ i want 1280x1024 on each..
the texture size is only 2048, so everything over that (the extra 512 pixels on the right hand side) wont be 3d
so it will be impossible for me to use desktop effects while using mergedFB?
